reviewText: This DVD features children (and some adults) signing.  The signs are easy to follow and there are some very cute songs which my children love to watch again and again.  This is the only sign language DVD that will hold their attention.  Love it!

The WeeHands At Home DVD teaches key vocabulary to use at home with baby, including getting started signs, food signs, family signs, and daily routine signs. The songs and language learning tips are fun and functional. Pair this with The Baby Signing Book: Includes 350 ASL Signs for Babies and Toddlers for a complete package!
